${ModID}:NobleStrike.NAME: Noble Strike
${ModID}:NobleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain 5 Gold. Draw a card. NL ${ModID}:Tribute 5: Draw a card.
${ModID}:NobleStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain 5 Gold. Draw a card. NL ${ModID}:Tribute 5: Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:NobleSlash.NAME: Noble Slash
${ModID}:NobleSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a random card. Draw one less the next turn.

${ModID}:WindShield.NAME: Wind Shield
${ModID}:WindShield.DESCRIPTION: Discard any amount of cards. Gain !B! Block for each discarded card.

${ModID}:Forcefield.NAME: Forcefield
${ModID}:Forcefield.DESCRIPTION: Discard one random card. Gain !M! Temp HP. ${ModID}:Tribute 8: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Temp HP.

${ModID}:ThrowSoulstones.NAME: Throw Soulstones
${ModID}:ThrowSoulstones.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. ${ModID}:Tribute 30: deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to ALL enemies, then Exhaust.

${ModID}:ThrowSoulstonesTribute.NAME: Tribute
${ModID}:ThrowSoulstonesTribute.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 30: deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, then Exhaust.
${ModID}:ThrowSoulstonesTribute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 30: deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, then Exhaust.

${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.NAME: Boundless Talent
${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have !M!. NL ${ModID}:Tribute 10: Copy one card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until you have !M!. ${ModID}:Tribute 10: Copy one card in your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:BoundlessTalentTribute.NAME: Tribute
${ModID}:BoundlessTalentTribute.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 10: Copy one card in your hand.

${ModID}:Willpower.NAME: Willpower
${ModID}:Willpower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL ${ModID}:Tribute 10: Gain 1 Buffer.

${ModID}:MajesticBloodline.NAME: Majestic Bloodline
${ModID}:MajesticBloodline.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 of !M! random Powers to your draw pile. ${ModID}:Tribute 15: play this again. Exhaust.
${ModID}:MajesticBloodline.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle 1 of !M! random Powers to your draw pile. ${ModID}:Tribute 15: play this again. Exhaust.

${ModID}:MoreSupplies.NAME: More Supplies!
${ModID}:MoreSupplies.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random Potion. ${ModID}:Tribute 30: fill your Potion Belt with random Potions.
${ModID}:MoreSupplies.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a random Potion. ${ModID}:Tribute 25: fill your Potion Belt with random Potions.

${ModID}:MoreSuppliesTribute.NAME: Tribute
${ModID}:MoreSuppliesTribute.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute !M!: fill your Potion Belt with random Potions.

${ModID}:NobleForm.NAME: Noble Form
${ModID}:NobleForm.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, draw a card. When you lose HP, gain 5 Gold.
${ModID}:NobleForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you discard or play a card, draw a card. When you lose Gold or HP, gain 5 Gold.
